name: Squares and balls (pre-Alpha)
description:
Well.. you play as a square fighting with.. nothing  FOR NOW  don't worry I'll add enemies in the near future now you are a square avoiding lava and red rectangles ehh... i don't know if i can say anything more than that  well 3 levels for now. It says 5 but they are under construction and they'll be ready soon soo... ye if you want you can go ahead and download the game.  If you will download the game then ... um..enjoy it!

And if you won't download the game bye!

Oh and by the way there's like 15 minutes of content.
